trans-unit.source: Provides implicit <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> management for child messaging activities.
The CorrelationScope activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities.
When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the CorrelationScope implicit handle.
In the case of nested CorrelationScope, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the activity’s execution logic.
Builds and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> used by the child messaging activities.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.

The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.
Called by the workflow runtime to execute the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> activity.
The current native activity execution context.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
